creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: large oval bowl (a) with swirls carved into exterior, balanced on a four-sided block; 70 objects (b-sss) of varying sizes within the bowl; ceramic objects resemble large carved stone artifacts, broken dinnerware (cups and dishes) tumbled in the sand, and river stones; one object is tumbled glass
signed: on base, graphite: Brad Miller / 83-89 / AR
title: Sculpture
